title: Trying to get into the neighborhood.
content:
Have a client that wants this look. Any ideas. Im kind of stumped.

Thanks

comments.content: Check out the Alias type foundry. [Anamoly](http://web.archive.org/web/20140830231802/http:/www.alias.uk.com/anomoly_frameset.html) comes to mind...
Thanks a lot for the tip Chris. Good call too.
